ICIS SIGBPS Workshop on Blockchain 2018

December 13, 2018

Submission

About ICIS-SIGBPS

Conference

International Conference on Information Systems (ICIS) 2018 Conference will bring together information systems researchers from around the world to discuss cutting edge research

Workshop

SIGBPS workshop aims to extend the boundaries of research in business process management and services science by integrating new elements that have not been sufficiently emphasized in the past.
